00041 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>

00044 int
00045 lnet_peer_tables_create(void)
00046 {
00047         struct lnet_peer_table  *ptable;
00048         struct list_head        *hash;
00049         int                     i;
00050         int                     j;
00051 
00052         the_lnet.ln_peer_tables = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(),
00053                                                    sizeof(*ptable));
00054         if (the_lnet.ln_peer_tables == NULL) {
00055                 CERROR("Failed to allocate cpu-partition peer tables\n");
00056                 return -ENOMEM;
00057         }
00058 
00059         cfs_percpt_for_each(ptable, i, the_lnet.ln_peer_tables) {
00060                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ptable->pt_deathrow);
00061 
00062                 LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC(hash, lnet_cpt_table(), i,
00063                                  LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE * sizeof(*hash));
00064                 if (hash == NULL) {
00065                         CERROR("Failed to create peer hash table\n");
00066                         lnet_peer_tables_destroy();
00067                         return -ENOMEM;
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 for (j = 0; j < LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE; j++)
00071                         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&hash[j]);
00072                 ptable->pt_hash = hash; /* sign of initialization */
00073         }
00074 
00075         return 0;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void
00079 lnet_peer_tables_destroy(void)
00080 {
00081         struct lnet_peer_table  *ptable;
00082         struct list_head        *hash;
00083         int                     i;
00084         int                     j;
00085 
00086         if (the_lnet.ln_peer_tables == NULL)
00087                 return;
00088 
00089         cfs_percpt_for_each(ptable, i, the_lnet.ln_peer_tables) {
00090                 hash = ptable->pt_hash;
00091                 if (hash == NULL) /* not intialized */
00092                         break;
00093 
00094                 LASSERT(list_empty(&ptable->pt_deathrow));
00095 
00096                 ptable->pt_hash = NULL;
00097                 for (j = 0; j < LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE; j++)
00098                         LASSERT(list_empty(&hash[j]));
00099 
00100                 LIBCFS_FREE(hash, LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE * sizeof(*hash));
00101         }
00102 
00103         cfs_percpt_free(the_lnet.ln_peer_tables);
00104         the_lnet.ln_peer_tables = NULL;
00105 }
00106 
00107 static void
00108 lnet_peer_table_cleanup_locked(lnet_ni_t *ni, struct lnet_peer_table *ptable)
00109 {
00110         int              i;
00111         lnet_peer_t     *lp;
00112         lnet_peer_t     *tmp;
00113 
00114         for (i = 0; i < LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE; i++) {
00115                 list_for_each_entry_safe(lp, tmp, &ptable->pt_hash[i],
00116                                          lp_hashlist) {
00117                         if (ni != NULL && ni != lp->lp_ni)
00118                                 continue;
00119                         list_del_init(&lp->lp_hashlist);
00120                         /* Lose hash table's ref */
00121                         ptable->pt_zombies++;
00122                         lnet_peer_decref_locked(lp);
00123                 }
00124         }
00125 }
00126 
00127 static void
00128 lnet_peer_table_deathrow_wait_locked(struct lnet_peer_table *ptable,
00129                                      int cpt_locked)
00130 {
00131         int     i;
00132 
00133         for (i = 3; ptable->pt_zombies != 0; i++) {
00134                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt_locked);
00135 
00136                 if (IS_PO2(i)) {
00137                         CDEBUG(D_WARNING,
00138                                "Waiting for %d zombies on peer table\n",
00139                                ptable->pt_zombies);
00140                 }
00141                 set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
00142                 schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(1) >> 1);
00143                 lnet_net_lock(cpt_locked);
00144         }
00145 }
00146 
00147 static void
00148 lnet_peer_table_del_rtrs_locked(lnet_ni_t *ni, struct lnet_peer_table *ptable,
00149                                 int cpt_locked)
00150 {
00151         lnet_peer_t     *lp;
00152         lnet_peer_t     *tmp;
00153         lnet_nid_t       lp_nid;
00154         int              i;
00155 
00156         for (i = 0; i < LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE; i++) {
00157                 list_for_each_entry_safe(lp, tmp, &ptable->pt_hash[i],
00158                                          lp_hashlist) {
00159                         if (ni != lp->lp_ni)
00160                                 continue;
00161 
00162                         if (lp->lp_rtr_refcount == 0)
00163                                 continue;
00164 
00165                         lp_nid = lp->lp_nid;
00166 
00167                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt_locked);
00168                         lnet_del_route(LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY), lp_nid);
00169                         lnet_net_lock(cpt_locked);
00170                 }
00171         }
00172 }
00173 
00174 void
00175 lnet_peer_tables_cleanup(lnet_ni_t *ni)
00176 {
00177         int                     i;
00178         struct lnet_peer_table  *ptable;
00179         lnet_peer_t             *lp;
00180         struct list_head        deathrow;
00181 
00182         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&deathrow);
00183 
00184         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_shutdown || ni != NULL);
00185         /* If just deleting the peers for a NI, get rid of any routes these
00186          * peers are gateways for. */
00187         cfs_percpt_for_each(ptable, i, the_lnet.ln_peer_tables) {
00188                 lnet_net_lock(i);
00189                 lnet_peer_table_del_rtrs_locked(ni, ptable, i);
00190                 lnet_net_unlock(i);
00191         }
00192 
00193         /* Start the process of moving the applicable peers to
00194          * deathrow. */
00195         cfs_percpt_for_each(ptable, i, the_lnet.ln_peer_tables) {
00196                 lnet_net_lock(i);
00197                 lnet_peer_table_cleanup_locked(ni, ptable);
00198                 lnet_net_unlock(i);
00199         }
00200 
00201         /* Cleanup all entries on deathrow. */
00202         cfs_percpt_for_each(ptable, i, the_lnet.ln_peer_tables) {
00203                 lnet_net_lock(i);
00204                 lnet_peer_table_deathrow_wait_locked(ptable, i);
00205                 list_splice_init(&ptable->pt_deathrow, &deathrow);
00206                 lnet_net_unlock(i);
00207         }
00208 
00209         while (!list_empty(&deathrow)) {
00210                 lp = list_entry(deathrow.next, lnet_peer_t, lp_hashlist);
00211                 list_del(&lp->lp_hashlist);
00212                 LIBCFS_FREE(lp, sizeof(*lp));
00213         }
00214 }
00215 
00216 void
00217 lnet_destroy_peer_locked(lnet_peer_t *lp)
00218 {
00219         struct lnet_peer_table *ptable;
00220 
00221         LASSERT(lp->lp_refcount == 0);
00222         LASSERT(lp->lp_rtr_refcount == 0);
00223         LASSERT(list_empty(&lp->lp_txq));
00224         LASSERT(list_empty(&lp->lp_hashlist));
00225         LASSERT(lp->lp_txqnob == 0);
00226 
00227         ptable = the_lnet.ln_peer_tables[lp->lp_cpt];
00228         LASSERT(ptable->pt_number > 0);
00229         ptable->pt_number--;
00230 
00231         lnet_ni_decref_locked(lp->lp_ni, lp->lp_cpt);
00232         lp->lp_ni = NULL;
00233 
00234         list_add(&lp->lp_hashlist, &ptable->pt_deathrow);
00235         LASSERT(ptable->pt_zombies > 0);
00236         ptable->pt_zombies--;
00237 }
00238 
00239 lnet_peer_t *
00240 lnet_find_peer_locked(struct lnet_peer_table *ptable, lnet_nid_t nid)
00241 {
00242         struct list_head *peers;
00243         lnet_peer_t      *lp;
00244 
00245         LASSERT(!the_lnet.ln_shutdown);
00246 
00247         peers = &ptable->pt_hash[lnet_nid2peerhash(nid)];
00248         list_for_each_entry(lp, peers, lp_hashlist) {
00249                 if (lp->lp_nid == nid) {
00250                         lnet_peer_addref_locked(lp);
00251                         return lp;
00252                 }
00253         }
00254 
00255         return NULL;
00256 }
00257 
00258 int
00259 lnet_nid2peer_locked(lnet_peer_t **lpp, lnet_nid_t nid, int cpt)
00260 {
00261         struct lnet_peer_table  *ptable;
00262         lnet_peer_t             *lp = NULL;
00263         lnet_peer_t             *lp2;
00264         int                     cpt2;
00265         int                     rc = 0;
00266 
00267         *lpp = NULL;
00268         if (the_lnet.ln_shutdown) /* it's shutting down */
00269                 return -ESHUTDOWN;
00270 
00271         /* cpt can be LNET_LOCK_EX if it's called from router functions */
00272         cpt2 = cpt != LNET_LOCK_EX ? cpt : lnet_cpt_of_nid_locked(nid);
00273 
00274         ptable = the_lnet.ln_peer_tables[cpt2];
00275         lp = lnet_find_peer_locked(ptable, nid);
00276         if (lp != NULL) {
00277                 *lpp = lp;
00278                 return 0;
00279         }
00280 
00281         if (!list_empty(&ptable->pt_deathrow)) {
00282                 lp = list_entry(ptable->pt_deathrow.next,
00283                                 lnet_peer_t, lp_hashlist);
00284                 list_del(&lp->lp_hashlist);
00285         }
00286 
00287         /*
00288          * take extra refcount in case another thread has shutdown LNet
00289          * and destroyed locks and peer-table before I finish the allocation
00290          */
00291         ptable->pt_number++;
00292         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00293 
00294         if (lp != NULL)
00295                 memset(lp, 0, sizeof(*lp));
00296         else
00297                 LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC(lp, lnet_cpt_table(), cpt2, sizeof(*lp));
00298 
00299         if (lp == NULL) {
00300                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00301                 lnet_net_lock(cpt);
00302                 goto out;
00303         }
00304 
00305         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lp->lp_txq);
00306         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lp->lp_rtrq);
00307         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lp->lp_routes);
00308 
00309         lp->lp_notify = 0;
00310         lp->lp_notifylnd = 0;
00311         lp->lp_notifying = 0;
00312         lp->lp_alive_count = 0;
00313         lp->lp_timestamp = 0;
00314         lp->lp_alive = !lnet_peers_start_down(); /* 1 bit!! */
00315         lp->lp_last_alive = cfs_time_current(); /* assumes alive */
00316         lp->lp_last_query = 0; /* haven't asked NI yet */
00317         lp->lp_ping_timestamp = 0;
00318         lp->lp_ping_feats = LNET_PING_FEAT_INVAL;
00319         lp->lp_nid = nid;
00320         lp->lp_cpt = cpt2;
00321         lp->lp_refcount = 2;    /* 1 for caller; 1 for hash */
00322         lp->lp_rtr_refcount = 0;
00323 
00324         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
00325 
00326         if (the_lnet.ln_shutdown) {
00327                 rc = -ESHUTDOWN;
00328                 goto out;
00329         }
00330 
00331         lp2 = lnet_find_peer_locked(ptable, nid);
00332         if (lp2 != NULL) {
00333                 *lpp = lp2;
00334                 goto out;
00335         }
00336 
00337         lp->lp_ni = lnet_net2ni_locked(LNET_NIDNET(nid), cpt2);
00338         if (lp->lp_ni == NULL) {
00339                 rc = -EHOSTUNREACH;
00340                 goto out;
00341         }
00342 
00343         lp->lp_txcredits    =
00344         lp->lp_mintxcredits = lp->lp_ni->ni_peertxcredits;
00345         lp->lp_rtrcredits    =
00346         lp->lp_minrtrcredits = lnet_peer_buffer_credits(lp->lp_ni);
00347 
00348         list_add_tail(&lp->lp_hashlist,
00349                       &ptable->pt_hash[lnet_nid2peerhash(nid)]);
00350         ptable->pt_version++;
00351         *lpp = lp;
00352 
00353         return 0;
00354 out:
00355         if (lp != NULL)
00356                 list_add(&lp->lp_hashlist, &ptable->pt_deathrow);
00357         ptable->pt_number--;
00358         return rc;
00359 }
00360 
00361 void
00362 lnet_debug_peer(lnet_nid_t nid)
00363 {
00364         char            *aliveness = "NA";
00365         lnet_peer_t     *lp;
00366         int             rc;
00367         int             cpt;
00368 
00369         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_nid(nid);
00370         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
00371 
00372         rc = lnet_nid2peer_locked(&lp, nid, cpt);
00373         if (rc != 0) {
00374                 lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00375                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "No peer %s\n", libcfs_nid2str(nid));
00376                 return;
00377         }
00378 
00379         if (lnet_isrouter(lp) || lnet_peer_aliveness_enabled(lp))
00380                 aliveness = lp->lp_alive ? "up" : "down";
00381 
00382         CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%-24s %4d %5s %5d %5d %5d %5d %5d %ld\n",
00383                libcfs_nid2str(lp->lp_nid), lp->lp_refcount,
00384                aliveness, lp->lp_ni->ni_peertxcredits,
00385                lp->lp_rtrcredits, lp->lp_minrtrcredits,
00386                lp->lp_txcredits, lp->lp_mintxcredits, lp->lp_txqnob);
00387 
00388         lnet_peer_decref_locked(lp);
00389 
00390         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00391 }
00392 
00393 int lnet_get_peer_info(__u32 peer_index, __u64 *nid,
00394                        char aliveness[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN],
00395                        __u32 *cpt_iter, __u32 *refcount,
00396                        __u32 *ni_peer_tx_credits, __u32 *peer_tx_credits,
00397                        __u32 *peer_rtr_credits, __u32 *peer_min_rtr_credits,
00398                        __u32 *peer_tx_qnob)
00399 {
00400         struct lnet_peer_table  *peer_table;
00401         lnet_peer_t             *lp;
00402         int                     j;
00403         int                     lncpt;
00404         bool                    found = false;
00405 
00406         /* get the number of CPTs */
00407         lncpt = cfs_percpt_number(the_lnet.ln_peer_tables);
00408 
00409         /* if the cpt number to be examined is >= the number of cpts in
00410          * the system then indicate that there are no more cpts to examin
00411          */
00412         if (*cpt_iter > lncpt)
00413                 return -ENOENT;
00414 
00415         /* get the current table */
00416         peer_table = the_lnet.ln_peer_tables[*cpt_iter];
00417         /* if the ptable is NULL then there are no more cpts to examine */
00418         if (peer_table == NULL)
00419                 return -ENOENT;
00420 
00421         lnet_net_lock(*cpt_iter);
00422 
00423         for (j = 0; j < LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE && !found; j++) {
00424                 struct list_head *peers = &peer_table->pt_hash[j];
00425 
00426                 list_for_each_entry(lp, peers, lp_hashlist) {
00427                         if (peer_index-- > 0)
00428                                 continue;
00429 
00430                         snprintf(aliveness, LNET_MAX_STR_LEN, "NA");
00431                         if (lnet_isrouter(lp) ||
00432                                 lnet_peer_aliveness_enabled(lp))
00433                                 snprintf(aliveness, LNET_MAX_STR_LEN,
00434                                          lp->lp_alive ? "up" : "down");
00435 
00436                         *nid = lp->lp_nid;
00437                         *refcount = lp->lp_refcount;
00438                         *ni_peer_tx_credits = lp->lp_ni->ni_peertxcredits;
00439                         *peer_tx_credits = lp->lp_txcredits;
00440                         *peer_rtr_credits = lp->lp_rtrcredits;
00441                         *peer_min_rtr_credits = lp->lp_mintxcredits;
00442                         *peer_tx_qnob = lp->lp_txqnob;
00443 
00444                         found = true;
00445                 }
00446 
00447         }
00448         lnet_net_unlock(*cpt_iter);
00449 
00450         *cpt_iter = lncpt;
00451 
00452         return found ? 0 : -ENOENT;
00453 }
